function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on open windows for high ventilation rates","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of preventive measures such as social distancing and mask-wearing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in covid-19 cases after relaxation of preventive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections due to airborne chemical and microbiological pollutants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to occupational diseases among health care workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate removed","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization of air","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate distribution of treated air","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear effectiveness of air purification technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv radiation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of uvgi for disinfection may not be effective for covid-19 virus in real-life scenarios due to the virus being concealed from direct uvc light.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The prolonged exposure to uvgi at dosages ranging from 1000 to 3000 mj/cm 2 may pose health risks to individuals if not used properly.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The susceptibility of coronavirus to uv irradiation, while effective, may not eliminate the risk of disease transmission through other means, such as surface contamination and airborne particles.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ineffective air filters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper installation of air filters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of epidemic through air conditioning systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of
